comment.realname: il nome sulle foto/ /my name is on my pics
comment.author: 34389581@N07
comment._content:
OMG! This is my town after october1943/july1944 air raids..."Ottaviano Augusto" cruiser sunk on a side and the Royal Yacht "Savoia" burnt in the docks...on the hill on left lower side the Cathedral of the XI/XIII century...
Thanks for sharing this!

comment.author: 49487266@N07
comment._content: [http://www.flickr.com/photos/34389581@N07] We are glad you found it!
